attributes.action: Education in schools about litter & recycling + Higher fines to litter offenders
attributes.additional_details:
Since lockdown eased the amount of litter left on beaches etc is awful.
We need to do something before we kill our planet.
Compulsory education on the devastating effects litter has on the Earth & how recycling helps needs to be added to the school curriculum.
And higher fines issued to offenders
attributes.background:
Make education about litter and recycling compulsory 
Introduce higher fines to offenders.
Put public service announcements about litter and the devastating effects of litter and the importance of recycling onto the TV and media.

rejection.details:
Increase penalties, enforcement and education to tackle littering & fly tipping:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324488
